channel.title: Help!
channel.description:
ok guys i cant load any client , it always says:
caused by java.langclassnotfoundexception:EGUI java.net.URLclassloader$1.run<unkown source>
there is more but i cant be asked rightin it down it keeps saying unkown source in brackets all the time and then it says press any key to continue then i do it it closes
please help me

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

yea, you still need to change the .bat.

@echo off
title GlobalScape Client 1.0
color 0a
java -Xmx500m -classpath . EGUI
pause

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @gangstaboy_D gangstaboy:D
item.description:
@gangstaboy_D wrote:

ok here it is:
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: EGUI
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: EGUI
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source)
Press any key to continue . . .[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 21, 2008, 06:50:50 am[/size][hr][quote=“x blitz x, post:4, topic:227285”]i know what error you have,

are you sure you have EGUI.class in your source files.
if you have.

post what code you have in your run.bat(or whatever its called).[/quote]no its not there is it supposed to be EGUI.class?
